author: jbellis
msg: Replace DebuggableScheduledThreadPoolExecutor with non-Scheduled Executors and Timers.  This allows logging exceptions from repeated tasks, which is basically impossible with STPE.
patch by jbellis; reviewed by Jun Rao for CASSANDRA-455
